code: import React from"react";import{Carousel,Container}from"react-bootstrap";import"../styles/ProjectCarousel.css";import project1 from"../assets/project1.webp";import project2 from"../assets/project2.webp";import project3 from"../assets/project3.webp";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProjectCarousel(){const projects=[{image:project1,title:"MGM University Fire Safety Installation",description:"Complete fire safety system installation, ensuring top-tier protection for students and staff."},{image:project2,title:"Prozone Mall Fire Hydrant System",description:"Advanced fire hydrant system for one of the largest malls in Marathwada."},{image:project3,title:"Carnival Mariplex - Pune",description:"State-of-the-art fire suppression system installed for ultimate safety in entertainment spaces."}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"project-carousel my-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center mb-4",children:"Our Major Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{interval:3000,fade:true,children:projects.map((project,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Carousel.Item,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"d-block w-100 carousel-image",src:project.image,alt:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Carousel.Caption,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:project.description})]})]},index))})]});}export default ProjectCarousel;
